physical_appearance: This is a cushion cover. It is square in shape, with a multicolored geometric scrolling border, and a cotton weave in the center. The cotton weave features a stylized embroidery of four deities, with a row of small flowers in the center.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) deities depictions (visual works) flower (motif) beadwork (visual works) cushions
